# Spatial relationships

For this lab, we will be fetching data from two resources:

- <https://opendata.city-adm.lviv.ua/dataset/>
- <https://map.city-adm.lviv.ua/dataset/>

# Exercises

1. Download datasets:
  - districts dataset: <https://opendata.city-adm.lviv.ua/dataset/mikrorayony-lvova>.
  - addresses dataset: <https://opendata.city-adm.lviv.ua/dataset/adreslviv>
  - mobility dataset: <https://opendata.city-adm.lviv.ua/dataset/suburban-mobility>
  - POI (point-of-interest) dataset:
    - shelters: <https://map.city-adm.lviv.ua/opendata_page/2765617480184367031>
    - historical monuments: <https://map.city-adm.lviv.ua/opendata_page/12727154373001049>
    - playgrounds: <https://map.city-adm.lviv.ua/opendata_page/2342814049890207007>
    - botanical POIs: <https://map.city-adm.lviv.ua/opendata_page/2372652871767295987>
2. Compute:
  - POI counts per city district
  - distances from each city address to closest POI. Describe stats.
  - visualize 20 most common source locations for visitors (Mobility dataset)
  - average distance traveled (Mobility dataset)
